metadata.title: Pimpernel Parisian Scenes Collection Sandwich Tray | Serving Platter | Crudit√© and Appetizer Tray | Made of Melamine | Measures 15.1" x 6.5" | Dishwasher Safe
features: INCREDIBLE ARTISTRY: Even if an international vacation isn't in your budget yet, you can get a little taste of Paris in your home with the Parisian Scenes Collection from Pimpernel. This design pairs perfectly with any existing decor, making a great addition to your home or a lovely gift to a friend.

SERVING MADE SIMPLE: Our quality melamine trays are strong, robust and durable, and, being dishwasher-safe, are also brilliantly practical. Not only hardwearing, they are also beautiful and feature a variety of decorative designs, perfectly complementing our comprehensive collection of placemats and coasters.

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE: Pimpernel is the premier brand for placemats, coasters, trays and accessories, with an outstanding and unique range that is renowned for its high quality. Pimpernel's exclusive homewares, textiles and gifts are created to suit all tastes, and make wonderful additions to the home.

TIMELESS DESIGNS: Portmeirion was founded by legendary ceramic designer Susan William-Ellis in 1960 and has remained at the forefront of contemporary design ever since. Renowned for our tableware and giftware, Portmeirion produces beautiful and unique collections all of which are made to the highest standard to be enjoyed every day.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Package contains (1) Pimpernel Parisian Scenes Collection Sandwich Tray. Made of Melamine. Sandwich Tray measures 15.1 x 6.5 inches. Product is dishwasher safe.
description: The quality melamine trays are strong, robust and durable, and brilliantly practical. Not only hardwearing, they are also beautiful and feature a variety of decorative designs, perfectly complementing the comprehensive collection of placemats and coasters
